nodes.text: The Suhuurmin system was a star system that was located within the Quence sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. During the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance, a group of slavers that was not authorized by the Empire operated out of the Suhuurmin system. At some point between 0 ABY and 4 ABY, the bounty hunter organization Mantis Syndicate exterminated the group.

The Suhuurmin system was first mentioned in the 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, which was written by Simon Smith and Eric S. Trautmann for West End Games. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system in grid square P-18.
